rules.natural: If the conservation board approved the funding proposal, then the project team launched the forest restoration.
If the project team submitted the environmental impact report, then the conservation board approved the funding proposal.
Either the project team submitted the environmental impact report or the ecologists completed the habitat assessment.
If the ecologists completed the habitat assessment, then the conservation board approved the funding proposal.
If the conservation board initiated an emergency review, then management halted the conservation project.
If the project team requested additional funding, then the conservation board initiated an emergency review.
If the project team did not launch the forest restoration, then the project team requested additional funding.

facts.natural: Management did not halt the conservation project.

target.natural: The project team launched the forest restoration.

steps.natural: The conservation board approved the funding proposal.
The project team launched the forest restoration.
If the project team did not launch the forest restoration, then the conservation board initiated an emergency review.
If the project team did not launch the forest restoration, then management halted the conservation project.
The project team launched the forest restoration.

natural_facts.A1: The conservation board approved the funding proposal.
natural_facts.A2: The project team submitted the environmental impact report.
natural_facts.A3: The ecologists completed the habitat assessment.
natural_facts.A5: The conservation board initiated an emergency review.
natural_facts.A6: The project team requested additional funding.
natural_facts.G: The project team launched the forest restoration.

(A1 → G).natural: If the conservation board approved the funding proposal, then the project team launched the forest restoration.

(A2 → A1).natural: If the project team submitted the environmental impact report, then the conservation board approved the funding proposal.

(A2 ∨ A3).natural: Either the project team submitted the environmental impact report or the ecologists completed the habitat assessment.

(A3 → A1).natural: If the ecologists completed the habitat assessment, then the conservation board approved the funding proposal.

(A5 → A4).natural: If the conservation board initiated an emergency review, then management halted the conservation project.

(A6 → A5).natural: If the project team requested additional funding, then the conservation board initiated an emergency review.

(¬G → A4).natural: If the project team did not launch the forest restoration, then management halted the conservation project.

(¬G → A5).natural: If the project team did not launch the forest restoration, then the conservation board initiated an emergency review.

(¬G → A6).natural: If the project team did not launch the forest restoration, then the project team requested additional funding.

A1.natural: The conservation board approved the funding proposal.

G.natural: The project team launched the forest restoration.

¬A4.natural: Management did not halt the conservation project.
